metadata.name: Suspicious Use of PsLogList
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the PsLogList utility to dump event log in order to extract admin accounts and perform account discovery or delete events logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('psloglist.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psloglist.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psloglist64.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' security')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' application')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' system'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —g')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―g'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of the PsLogList utility to dump event log in order to extract admin accounts and perform account discovery or delete events logs

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Another tool that uses the command line switches of PsLogList 2. Legitimate use of PsLogList by an administrator References: https://research.nccgroup.com/2021/01/12/abusing-cloud-services-to-fly-under-the-radar/, https://www.cybereason.com/blog/deadringer-exposing-chinese-threat-actors-targeting-major-telcos, https://github.com/3CORESec/MAL-CL/tree/master/Descriptors/Sysinternals/PsLogList, https://twitter.com/EricaZelic/status/1614075109827874817
